text: Escalon is a city in San Joaquin County, California. It lies 118 feet (36 m) above sea level and is 19 miles (31.4 km) southeast of Stockton, along California State Route 120. At the 2020 census, 7,472 people lived there. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Joaquin County, California
title: Escalon, California
